body:
Has anyone ever been stringy or idiotic to you? Use this guide to Minecraft servers and real life. :) http://www.ishouldhavesaid.net/top-ten/

Be happy to have access this guide! It will help you protect your very own reputation on Avicus against imbecile and moronic people. It will help you be known as sane and wise.

title: Amazing Guide To Literary Comebacks!

replies.body: I'm surprised that this is even a thing o.O
replies.body_tagged: I'm surprised that this is even a thing o.O

replies.body: I know exactly what I'm gonna do now. First, Lose sleep while I try to memorize some comebacks for school. Then, I will give up and write them down. In the morning I will be so exited that I will forget my paper, and then fail at trying to say them by memory. HYPE!
